forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 34F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of snow later in the day. High 2C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with snow developing in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the morning. High 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 11F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 7F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 18F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low -12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 9F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 21F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 17F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 21F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.
